description: A vulnerability in the HPE Aruba Networking Virtual Intranet Access (VIA) client could allow malicious users to overwrite arbitrary files as NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM. A successful exploit could allow these malicious users to create a Denial-of-Service (DoS) condition affecting the Microsoft Windows operating System boot process.

product.name: HPE Aruba Networking Virtual Intranet Access (VIA)

enisaIdProduct.product_version: HPE Aruba Networking Virtual Intranet Access (VIA) client for Microsoft Windows ≤≤4.5.0
